description:
Really good apple pie should also be really easy to bake. Apple pie is iconic for its simplicity — warmly spiced apples are baked until tender in a buttery crisp crust; Yet pie purist have complicated recipes in order to make a perfect slice. While dedicated an entire day to making crust and cooking apple filling can be fun, sometimes don't you just want an easy, fail-proof recipes you can bake in an afternoon? 

This apple pie is exactly that — it doesn't involve special ingredients, it actually encourages you to grab a store bought crust, and the filling is just 5 ingredients all of which are probably already in your kitchen. This is the easiest apple pie recipe I know and it is also warmly spiced, sweet, and perfectly sliceable.
name: How to Make the Easiest Apple Pie
